hero.tagline: Your all-in-one AI toolkit: chat, photo analysis, weather, device insights, tech trends, analytics—and more.

items.a: Click Sign Up, fill the form, and start exploring.
Yes, core features are free. Premium adds advanced analytics.
Use the sun/mood icon to toggle light/dark modes.
We use encryption and never share your personal info.

why.title: Why We Built It
why.text: Tired of scattered AI tools and fragmented dashboards, our founder Wiltord set out to create one unified, intuitive experience. Synapse bundles chat, analytics, image insights, and more—so you can focus on building without the hassle.

jane.quote: Synapse's real-time analytics helped us double our engagement in just two weeks!

carlos.quote: The AI-powered photo analyzer is magical—our marketing team loves it.

aisha.quote: Reliable, fast, and easy to use. A must-have toolkit.

alex.bio: Built Synapse out of a dream—loves clean code & strong coffee.

maya.bio: Architect of our micro-services & React wizard.

ravi.bio: Designing our ML models—PhD in neural networks.
